content.value:
More Americans died of COVID19 today than died on 9/11.

After that horrendous attack, we restructured our way of life & accepted limits on our freedoms to combat the threat of terrorism.

9/11 was one day. COVID is everyday.

Be a patriot. Wear a mask. Help us end this pandemic.
content.html: More Americans died of COVID19 today than died on 9/11. After that horrendous attack, we restructured our way of life & accepted limits on our freedoms to combat the threat of terrorism. 9/11 was one day. COVID is everyday. Be a patriot. Wear a mask. Help us end this pandemic.
